authCodeExpired.msg: Your login state has expired. Please try initializing authentication again.

consent.title: Authorize App
consent.requestAccess: is requesting access to your account.

emailMfa.title: A verification code has been sent to your email.

manageRecoveryCode.title: Regenerate Recovery Code
manageRecoveryCode.desc: Your current recovery code will be replaced with a new one.
manageRecoveryCode.success: Recovery code regenerated! Please keep a copy of this code in a safe place.

mfaEnroll.title: Select one of the MFA type

otpMfa.setup: Use your authenticator app to scan the image below:
otpMfa.yourKey: Use the following setup key to manually configure your authenticator app.
otpMfa.code: Enter the code generated by your authenticator app

passkeyEnroll.title: Enroll Passkey for a faster and more secure login process

recoveryCodeEnroll.title: Recovery Code
recoveryCodeEnroll.desc: Keep a copy of this code in a safe place. It can be used to recover your account if you forget your password.

passwordlessCode.title: A verification code has been sent to your email.

resetMfa.title: Reset your MFA
resetMfa.desc: Your current Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) method will be reset. After this reset, you will need to set up MFA again to ensure continued secure access to your account.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.desc: Enter your email address, we will send you a reset code by email

signUp.title: Create an account
signUp.signIn: Already have an account? Sign in
signUp.bySignUp: By signing up, you agree to our

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.desc: Enter your verification code received by email
verifyEmail.success: Verification successful! You can close this page now.

requestError.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to excessive login failures.
requestError.requireNewPassword: Your new password can not be same as old password.
requestError.requireNewEmail: Your new email can not be same as old email.
requestError.emailAlreadyVerified: The email address is already verified.
requestError.optMfaLocked: Too many failed OTP verification attempts. Please try again after 30 minutes.
requestError.smsMfaLocked: Too many SMS verification attempts. Please try again after 30 minutes.
requestError.emailMfaLocked: Too many email verification attempts. Please try again after 30 minutes.
requestError.passwordResetLocked: Too many password reset requests. Please try again tomorrow.
requestError.changeEmailLocked: Too many send email change code requests. Please try again after 30 minutes.
requestError.emailTaken: The email address is already in use.

validateError.passwordFormat: Password must be at least 8 characters, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
validateError.wrongPhoneFormat: the format must be a number up to fifteen digits in length starting with a '+' with country code.
validateError.isWeakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
validateError.passwordNotMatch: The password and confirm password do not match.
validateError.firstNameIsEmpty: First name can not be empty.
validateError.lastNameIsEmpty: Last name can not be empty.
validateError.otpCodeLengthIssue: OTP code can only be 6 digits numbers.
validateError.verificationCodeLengthIssue: Verification code can only be 6 characters.
